title: r/Tifu By Eating 8 Fiber Bars and Farting NONSTOP
description: r/Tifu In today's episode, OP gets really hungry and decides to eat a fiber bar, and then another, and then another until he's eaten 8 fiber bars. The next day, he and his cousins go on a long road trip. That's when trouble strikes. Those 8 fiber bars have transformed OP into farting machine, generating the most putrid gas that has ever been experienced, with OP letting one rip about once every 30 seconds or so.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
